sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using block matrices
message_1:
Consider the following system of linear equations:

2x + 3y - z = 5

4x - 5y + z = -7

6x + 7y - 3z = 21

Using block matrices, solve for the values of x,y, and z.
message_2:
To solve the given system of linear equations using block matrices, we first write the system in the matrix form AX = B, where A is the matrix of coefficients, X is the column matrix of variables (x, y, z), and B is the column matrix of constants.

A = |  2   3  -1 |
    |  4  -5   1 |
    |  6   7  -3 |

X = | x |
    | y |
    | z |

B = |  5  |
    | -7  |
    |  21 |

Now, we find the inverse of matrix A, denoted as A_inv, and then multiply it with matrix B to get the values of x, y, and z.

A_inv = (1/det(A)) * adj(A)

First, we find the determinant of A (det(A)):

det(A) = 2((-5)(-3) - (1)(7)) - 3((4)(-3) - (1)(6)) - (-1)((4)(7) - (6)(-5))
       = 2(15 - 7) - 3(-12 - 6) - (-1)(28 + 30)
       = 2(8) + 3(18) + 58
       = 16 + 54 + 58
       = 128

Now, we find the adjugate of A (adj(A)):

adj(A) = | (-5)(-3) - (1)(7)   (4)(-3) - (1)(6)   (4)(7) - (6)(-5) |
         | (3)(-3) - (-1)(7)   (2)(-3) - (-1)(6)   (2)(7) - (6)(3)  |
         | (3)(1) - (-5)(-1)   (2)(1) - (4)(-1)   (2)(-5) - (4)(3)  |

adj(A) = | 15 - 7   -12 - 6   28 + 30 |
         | -9 + 7   -6 + 6   14 - 18  |
         |  3 + 5    2 + 4   -10 - 12 |

adj(A) = |  8   -18   58 |
         | -2    0   -4  |
         |  8    6   -22 |

Now, we find the inverse of A (A_inv):

A_inv = (1/128) * adj(A)

A_inv = |  1/16   -9/64    29/64  |
        | -1/64    0      -1/32  |
        |  1/16    3/64   -11/64 |

Finally, we multiply A_inv with B to get the values of x, y, and z:

X = A_inv * B

X = |  1/16   -9/64    29/64  |  |  5  |
    | -1/64    0      -1/32  |  | -7  |
    |  1/16    3/64   -11/64 |  |  21 |

X = | (1/16)(5) + (-9/64)(-7) + (29/64)(21) |
    | (-1/64)(5) + (0)(-7) + (-1/32)(21)   |
    | (1/16)(5) + (3/64)(-7) + (-11/64)(21)|

X = | 5/16 + 63/64 + 609/64 |
    | -5/64 - 21/32         |
    | 5/16 - 21/64 - 231/64 |

X = | 677/64 |
    | -37/32 |
    | -43/64 |

So, the solution to the system of linear equations is:

x = 677/64 ≈ 10.578125
y = -37/32 ≈ -1.15625
z = -43/64 ≈ -0.671875
